title: Decision to unmask revoked
body_lines: The Health Ministry has withdrawn its decision to relax wearing masks outdoor and reversed its earlier decision with immediate effect and announced that wearing masks outdoors has been made mandatory yet again.
The fresh decision has been taken considering the large public gathering currently take place across country.
As per the new health ministry regulation, masks should be worn outdoors as done before and this directive will come to immediate effect and from today (21).
However, other measures stipulated in the Press Release dated April 18, will continue to be in force.
